title: Decorative font used on website
content:
Hi my client has lost their logo, and all the information regarding their website (groan) and I am left to redesign. I am having trouble identifying the font used in the word "College" for the header image and the font for "a great way of life" for the footer image.

Appreciate any help :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131204204047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/header_5862.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131204204047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/footer_6413.jpg)
author: wotnow

comments.content: Thanks so much .. Hopefully someone will be able to identify the other one. Much appreciated :)
Wow! Thanks so much, you guys certainly know your fonts! :)
